meta_description: Saturday, February 21st, at 6pm, we will be having a FREE Movie on the Mound, playing National Treasure.
hours_text:
# Hours and Admission

#### Hours of Operation

Grounds (Observation Pier and Kayak Launch) and public restrooms are open daily from 7:00AM to 6:30PM. 

Museum and Museum Store are open Wednesday through Saturday 9:00AM to 4:00PM.

#### Admission:

**Adult Admission:** $10.00,  
**Students with college ID:** $8.00  
**Children age 6-12 years of age:** $5.00  
**Mound House Members and Children 5 years of age and younger are free.**

****

  * **Museums for All Member. SNAP recipient receive free museum admission for up to four (4) people per SNAP Card.**
  * **Veterans and Active Duty Military Receive Free Admission**
  * **Teachers receive free admission.**
  * **Fort Myers Beach residents receive half-off admission price.**

# Hours and Admission

# Hours and Admission

accessibility_text:
# ADA Information

### MUSEUM ADA ACCESSIBILITY

#### CLICK IMAGE TO DOWNLOAD SITE PLAN

The Mound House museum is an ADA compliant facility and strives to make needed accessibility accommodations for our guests.

If at any time during your visit you need assistance, please speak with someone at our front desk so they may best assist your needs.

For a map of handicapped parking and accessibility ramps and entrances, please click on the map image.

Please feel free to contact us prior to your visit if you have additional questions.

  * [info@moundhouse.org](mailto:info@moundhouse.org)
  * [239-765-0865](tel:+12397650865)

* * *

### ONLINE ACCESSIBILITY

#### PLEASE CONTACT THE MOUND HOUSE TEAM FOR ANY ACCESSIBILITY ISSUES ON THE WEBSITE.

  * [info@moundhouse.org](mailto:info@moundhouse.org)
  * [239-765-0865](tel:+12397650865)

If you are using assistive technology to access content on this website and the format of any material interferes with your ability to access it, please let us know immediately and we will correct it.

  1. Please indicate the nature of your accessibility problem
  2. The preferred format in which you need to receive the material
  3. The webpage address of the requested material
  4. Your contact information and any other information that would allow us to better assist you

Thank you for this opportunity to serve you better.

### MUSEUM ADA ACCESSIBILITY

## Movies on the Mound

# 

Saturday, February 21st, at 6pm, we will be having a FREE Movie on the Mound, playing National Treasure. 

We hope to see you there!

## the Friends of the Mound House Present... a murder mystery party

## New Live Water Quality Sensor Installed at Mound House

[ Check Water Quality ](https://wqdatalive.com/public/1348)

### What is The Mound House? 

### _Mound Houseâ€™s mission is to preserve, share, and interpret 2,000 years of cultural and environmental history of Fort Myers Beach and Southwest Florida._

###  Museum 

Our six exhibit museum details nearly 2,000 years of cultural and environmental history of our site. Home to many different cultures including Calusa, Seminole, Latino, and Anglo-Americans; our site reflects the many layers of Southwest Florida's history! 

###  Kayak Tours 

Experience the natural beauty of Estero Bay while exploring tidal creeks and winding mangrove tunnels like only a kayaker can. We often see a wide variety of wading birds that you can only see in Florida, and sometimes dolphins and manatees!
